name: Melody XMAS Game
description:
We are closing in hot to our one year anniversary. As a huge thank you to Projekt Melody, the Science Team and all our Patrons, we have a Christmas season gift for you today: MELODY XMAS

Follow us on twitter 

Check out the patreon for the latest game builds and projects.

What’s better than a cup of hot choccie and a fat man in a red suit? 

Saving Christmas from a chaotic gremlin hell-bent on ruining it for everyone else, of course! Grab your Christmas hat and bring your best whacking hammer in Melody XMAS!

With Christmas right around the corner and the present quota piling up, Santa Claus has enlisted the help of a very unlikely person: Projekt Melody!

But bad luck has struck the North Pole: Malady has snuck inside, intent on stealing all the Christmas presents for herself!

Help Projekt Melody collect all the gifts, and save Christmas from the chaotic entity known as Malady!
